Name: Sentimental Melody
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (flamed).
STIR grapefruit preserve and rum in base of a shaker to dissolve the preserve.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A twisted Daiquiri with rich berry fruit.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Peter Dorelli , London, England.
